name: Flipper Hazard 2
description:
Flipper Hazard 2 is a sequel to Flipper Hazard which brings completely new stages and levels into play!

Control 2 or even 4 pads to pass the levels and achieve their goals. Raise your score by hitting the score raising objects on your way. Watch over your pinballs so you don't run out of them. Track your score and get those bonus points by hitting the bonus objects!

It's not the most important thing to play this game as fast as you can - but as careful as you can to get as much points as possible.

Get into the hazard mode and flip it all up!
